entry.p: Amend section 52.212-3 by—

i. Revising paragraph (c)(3);
ii. Redesignating paragraphs (c)(4) through (c)(10) as paragraphs (c)(5) through (c)(11), and adding a new paragraph (c)(4); and

f. Removing from the newly redesignated paragraph (c)(12) of Alternate I “(c)(4)” and adding “(c)(5)” in its place.
